text: Eberhard Panitz (16 April 1932 â€“ 1 October 2021) was a German writer, screenwriter, literary editor and publicist. He wrote documentaries, audio plays and scripts for movies and television. Many of his works were called socialist realism. He was born in Dresden, Germany. Panitz was a member of the Marxist forum of the Die Linke party. Panitz died on 1 October 2021 in Berlin at he age of 89. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German screenwriters Category:German editors Category:German political writers Category:Writers from Dresden Category:Writers from Berlin
title: Eberhard Panitz
